tool_description: Categorizes incoming emails by type, priority, and required action to help organize and prioritize email responses effectively.

email_content.description: Full email content including subject and body

sender_relationship.description: Relationship to sender: internal, external_client, vendor, unknown

error_messages: Empty email content: Provide email content for classification
Content too short: Minimum 20 characters required for meaningful classification
Invalid sender relationship: Use one of [internal, external_client, vendor, unknown]
usage: Provide the email_content and optionally specify sender_relationship. The tool analyzes and categorizes the email with priority and action recommendations.

email_category.description: Primary category of the email (e.g., request, information, complaint)

priority_level.description: Urgency level: low, medium, high, urgent

required_action.description: Recommended action: respond, forward, schedule, file, escalate

key_topics.description: Main topics or themes identified in the email
